[Abhishek Kumar](https://akumar.netlify.app/) is a classically trained botanist 
and plant ecologist living in Chandigarh. He is currently working as senior research fellow
at [Panjab University, Chandigarh](https://puchd.ac.in/). His research focuses 
the patterns and processes of plant distribution and diversity 
in Indian Siwaliks. He frequently collaborates with researchers who study plant ecology, 
community ecology, and biogeography.
